attributes.action: Unite With Us Against Gun Crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am fed up with the senseless gun crime that has been seeping into our society and claiming the lives of our young people. It has to stop. We all need to unite together and stop this evil, before it claims and destroys many more lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
